All this function come from bioloid cm-5 example (author: BS KIM from robotis)

Detailed Description

Robotis AX-12 functions.

You can connect on the DUAL-POB board robotis AX-12 servomotor. The robotis AX-12 servomotor is working with a serial bus and support easy daisy chain connection.

Example code: use AX-12 servomotor.
        UInt16 positions[2];

        // Init the ax-12 serial bus.
        InitAx12Bus();

        // Send position to servo 1 and servo 2.
        SetAx12Position(1,500,130);
        SetAx12Position(2,500,130);

        // Move servomotors.
        MoveAx12();

        // Wait...
        Wait_Ms(1000);

        // Set position with an array of positions
        positions[0] = 0;
        positions[1] = 1;
        SetAx12Movement(positions,2,130);
        // or equivalent function: SetAx12MovementWithOffset(positions,0,2,130);

        // Move servomotors.
        MoveAx12();

wrong header error

#define AX12_ERR_WRONG_LEN   -4

wrong len error

void InitAx12Bus ( void   ) 

Init AX-12 communication bus on uart1.

void MoveAx12 ( void   ) 

Move all servomotor at the same time!

Before move servomotor, you must set position and speed of the servomotor with the SetAx12Position() function.

See also:
SetAx12Position

Int8 PingAx12 ( UInt8  identifier  ) 

Ping a ax-12 servomotor.

Parameters:
identifier AX-12 servomotor
Returns:
1 if servomotor is find, else 0.

Parameters:

[out] data Data read. You must allocate the array!
Returns:

receive a packet from AX-12

Parameters:

Returns:
Lenght of return packet or error code.

void SetAx12Id ( UInt8  identifier  ) 

Set idenfitifer of an ax-12 servomotor.

Warning:
BEFORE CALL THIS FUNCTION, MAKE SURE THERE IS ONLY ONE AX-12 SERVOMOTOR CONNECTED ON THE DUAL-POB!
Parameters:
identifier New AX-12 identifier

void SetAx12Movement ( UInt16 *  position,
UInt8  servonumber,
UInt16  speed 
)

Set movement of AX-12 servomotors.

The servomotor 1 to servonumber+1 will move at the specified position.

Parameters:
position Position array
servonumber Length of position array
speed Speed of servomotor

void SetAx12MovementWithOffset ( UInt16 *  position,
UInt8  servoOffset,
UInt8  servonumber,
UInt16  speed 
)

Set movement of AX-12 servomotors.

The servomotor servoOffset+1 to servonumber+1 will move at the specified position.

Parameters:
position Position array
servoOffset First servomotor identifier
servonumber Length of position array
speed Speed of servomotor

Int8 SetAx12Position ( UInt8  identifier,
UInt16  position,
UInt16  speed 
)

Prepare position and speed of a servomotor.

Position and speed are send to the servomotor but the servo don't move.

See also:
Action to move your servomotor!
Parameters:
identifier Servomotor id
position Servomotor position
speed Servomotor speed
Returns:
0 if no error. else protocol error code

UInt8  data 
)

Set paramaters of packet.

Set the packet parameters before call the TxPacket function

Parameters:
index Parameter index in packet parameter buffer
data Data

UInt8 TxPacket ( UInt8  bID,
UInt8  bInstruction,
UInt8  bParameterLength 
)

send a packet to AX-12

Parameters:

bInstruction Instruction
bParameterLength Lenght of parameters
Returns:
